Description:
Bosch Global Software Technologies Private Limited (BGSW) is a 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH. We are one of the world’s leading global suppliers of technology and services, offering end-to-end Engineering, IT, and Business Solutions.With a global footprint and presence in US, Europe, Japan, China, and the Asia Pacific region, we are at the forefront of designing, developing, and executing IoT ecosystems through our all-encompassing capability within the 3 aspects of IoT – Sensors, Software, and Services.We have always focused on improving the quality of the life of people, providing newer revenue-generating opportunities, and improving operational efficiencies for enterprises through an array of solutions. With our unique ability to offer end-to-end solutions that connect Sensors, Software, and Services, we enable businesses to move from the traditional to digital, or improve businesses by introducing a digital element in their products and processes.Responsible for leading Cross Functional SW Team towards successful Project Delivery
Responsible for Project Scope, Planning, Execution, Monitoring & Tracking using Agile methodologies
Data Oriented Project Management for Targets, Progress and Success Criteria
Applying Active Risk Management, Proactive Thinking, Analytical Methods
Motivate, Engage, Evaluate Competency needs, Identify Skill gaps and ensure right Team Composition
Actively engage and update Stakeholders across Geographical regions and multiple Business Divisions
Understand Organization Goals, align with the Project Goals and achieve the Collaborative Targets
Impactful Communication in written, verbal in one to one or group settings, physical and virtual environment.
Technically Guide the team, co-ordinate feasibility evaluation with Architects, Influencing Skills to arrive at Decisions under various context
Experience in CAN, FR, Ethernet, UDS, Autosar, ISO 26262, DFMEA
Experience in Debugging methods, Debugging tools, Microcontroller Architecture
Experience in ADAS Application SAE Levels of L0, L1 and L2
Prepare Technical Proposals and Effort Estimation using various Techniques
Knowledge in Legal Compliance, NCAP, Homologation Process.B.E/B.Tech / M.E/M.Tech + Work Experience of 8 to 12 YearsPMP is preferredJob Details
